info.description: Public API for managing Clever-Cloud data and products
info.title: Clever-Cloud

get.description: Retrieve events as they come through a websocket connection. To have authorization, you have to send a `{ "message_type": "oauth", "authorization": "oauth authorization string" }` message
Retrieve logs as they come through a chunked, never-ending response

parameters.description: Tell the user-agent to download the body as a file
parameters.name: download

get.description: Retrieve logs as they come through a websocket connection. To have authorization, you have to send a `{ "message_type": "oauth", "authorization": "oauth authorization string" }` message

parameters.description: Only fetch logs newer than this (ISO-8601 formatted) date
parameters.name: since

parameters.description: Only fetch logs emitted by this deployment
parameters.name: deployment_id

get.description: Fetch the logs for a given application

parameters.description: Lowest bound for logs date, ISO 8601
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: Highest bounds for logs date, ISO 8601
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: Only fetch logs emitted by this deployment
parameters.name: deployment_id

get.description: Fetch the logs drains for a given application

post.description: Add a log drain for a given application

delete.description: Delete the logs drain by id or url for a given application

get.description: Fetch the logs drain by id or url for a given application

post.description: create a hook for e-mail notifications

200.description: Get all informations about all providers.
Get all informations about given provider.

post.description: Creates an application. If you want to create a Github app, you need to replace the oauthApp field with what you will find here: https://github.com/CleverCloud/doc.clever-cloud.com/issues/179

200.description: Get env variables defined by application dependencies

put.description: If you want to upload an image from your computer, send the image in the body of the request without anything else.

200.description: PUT the same data as in POST.

default.description: Get the payments methods for the {id} organisation.
Add a payment method to {id} organisation.
Get the default payment method for {id} organisation.
Set the default payment method for {id} organisation.

post.description: Creates an application. If you want to create a Github app, you need to replace the oauthApp field with what you will find here: https://github.com/CleverCloud/doc.clever-cloud.com/issues/179

200.description: Get env variables defined by application dependencies
PUT same consumer data as in POST.

configKeys.description: Environments variables link to the addon.

creationDate.description: The creation timestamp of the addon

Avatar.description: If you want to upload an image from your computer, send the image in the body of the request without anything else.

features.description: The list of the feature in the addon

analyticsId.description: The id of the analytics page link to this addon

googlePlusName.description: The name of the google + page link to this addon (could be empty)

logoUrl.description: The url of the addon's logo

longDesc.description: A less concise description of the addon

openInNewTab.description: Does the addon panel need to be open in a new tab

regions.description: The differents regions where the addon is available

shortDesc.description: A short description of the addon

status.description: The status of this addon (RELEASE, BETA, ...)

supportEmail.description: The mail to contact in case of issue with this addon

twitterName.description: The name of the user to contact on twitter for this addon (could be empty)

website.description: The website of the provider. If the addon is developped by clever-cloud, the site is "http://www.clever-cloud.com/"

URL.description: Must be a valid HTTP URL

avatar.description: The location of the user's avatar

creationDate.description: The creation timestamp of the user

emailValidated.description: Does the user email is validate

company.description: The company's name of the organisation.

zipcode.description: The zipcode of the city's organisation.
